isMonophyletic

public static boolean isMonophyletic(Tree tree,
                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> leafNodes)

isMonophyletic

public static boolean isMonophyletic(Tree tree,
                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> leafNodes,
                                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignore)
Performs a monophyly test on a set of leaf nodes. The nodes are monophyletic if there is a node in the tree which subtends all the taxa in the set (and only those taxa).

Parameters:
tree - a tree object to perform test on
leafNodes - a set of leaf node ids
ignore - a set of ids to ignore in monophyly assessment
Returns:
boolean is monophyletic?

isMonophyletic

private static boolean isMonophyletic(Tree tree,
                                      NodeRef node,
                                      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> leafNodes,
                                      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignore,
                                      int cardinality,
                                      int[] matchCount,
                                      int[] leafCount,
                                      boolean[] isMono)
Private recursive function used by isMonophyletic.

Parameters:
tree - a tree object to perform test on
node - the node that is currently being assessed in recursive procedure
leafNodes - a set of leaf node ids
ignore - a set of ids to ignore in monophyly assessment
cardinality - the size of leafNodes set
Returns:
boolean is monophyletic?

newick

public static void newick(Tree tree,
                          NodeRef node,
                          boolean labels,
                          Tree.BranchLengthType lengths,
                          java.text.NumberFormat format,
                          BranchRates branchRates,
                          TreeTraitProvider[] treeTraitProviders,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> idMap,
                          java.lang.StringBuffer buffer)
Recursive function for constructing a newick tree representation in the given buffer.

Parameters:
tree - The tree
node - The node [tree.getRoot()]
labels - whether labels or numbers should be used
lengths - What type of branch lengths: NO_BRANCH_LENGTHS, LENGTHS_AS_TIME, LENGTHS_AS_SUBSTITUTIONS
branchRates - An optional BranchRates (or null) used to scale branch times into substitutions
treeTraitProviders - An array of TreeTraitProvider
format - formatter for branch lengths
idMap - A map if id names to integers that is used to overide node labels when present
buffer - The StringBuffer
